name: Professor Watts Memory Match: Shapes And Colors
description: Hello Professor Watts here and I have some research to do on memory skills. I have assembled a wide variety of shapes and colors to put our memory to the test. We can see how we're doing by completing matches in a specific amount of time and earning points to track our overall progress.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 + Processor: Intel Core i5 + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
